title: Rusty Anchor Inn

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Rusty Anchor Inn is a bar in Port Sarim, located just north of the docks.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Rusty Anchor Inn
This article is about the bar. For the ship named Rusty Anchor, see The Rusty Anchor.
Rusty Anchor Inn
Released6 April 2001 (Update)
MembersNo
Minimap icon
LocationPort Sarim
OwnerBartender (Rusty Anchor Inn)
SpecialtyBeer
Location

The Rusty Anchor Inn is a bar in Port Sarim, located just north of the docks.

It is one of the bars visited during the Alfred Grimhand's Barcrawl miniquest.

Stock[edit | edit source]

ItemPrice
sold at		GE
price
Beer 2 91

Personalities[edit | edit source]

  • Bartender
  • Ahab
  • Longbow Ben
  • Jack Seagull

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Jack Seagull and Longbow Ben are references to Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl. Ahab is a reference to Captain Ahab from Moby-Dick.
  • If you stand in between Longbow Ben and Jack Seagull and talk to them, an interesting conversation will take place.
  • It was once possible to obtain free beer by using a beer glass on a barrel.
